content:
# The furnace has produced 9 iron plates, but it is currently indicating "no ingredients to smelt." 
# This suggests that the furnace has finished processing the available iron ore but is not recognizing it correctly in the inventory.
# 
# I will extract the iron plates from the furnace to ensure they are added to my inventory.

# Extracting the iron plates from the furnace.
extracted_plates = extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace.position, quantity=9)  # Attempting to extract all 9 iron plates.
print(f"Extracted Iron Plates: {extracted_plates}")
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking the inventory after extraction.
